body_html:
NVCC can fail because of:

  • Compiler not supported:
    Use older c++17/14 compiler; you can download it from visual studio installer and after that change the CUDA_HOST_COMPILER path (per CMake);
    C:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Visual Studio/2017/Professional/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.11.25503/bin as example
    See: https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1027299/cuda-9-failed-to-support-the-latest-visual-studio-2017-version-15-5/

  • whitespaces in include-path (shouldn't be your issue)

Didn't look into what causes the Iterator error, but you can use use something like this instead of lower_bound

Iterator::Iterator(SparseColumnIterable* iter, int64 example_idx)
	: iter_(iter), example_idx_(example_idx), end_(iter->ix_.dimension(0)) {
	IndicesRowIterator start = IndicesRowIterator(iter, 0);
	const IndicesRowIterator end = IndicesRowIterator(iter, end_);
	size_t count = std::distance(start, end);

	while (0 < count)
	{	// divide and conquer, find half that contains answer
		size_t count2 = count >> 1; // TRANSITION, VSO#433486
		const IndicesRowIterator _Mid = std::next(start, count2);
		if (_Mid.row_idx() < example_idx)
		{	// try top half
			start = _Next_iter(_Mid);
			count -= count2 + 1;
		}
		else
		{
			count = count2;
		}
	}

	cur_ = next_ = start.row_idx();
	UpdateNext();
}
